name: php-monitor-integration
title: PHP Monitor Integration
description:
Control PHP Monitor, a utility application for the Mac. 

https://phpmon.app
author: nicoverbruggen

commands.name: index
commands.title: PHP Monitor
commands.subtitle: Interact with PHP Monitor, provided it is running.
commands.description: You can order PHP Monitor to perform various actions. Requires the integration with third-party options not to be disabled. (This option is enabled by default in PHP Monitor.)
